Raspberry Jam
300g Raspberries
150g caster sugar
0.5 teaspoons agar agar powder
try reducing sugar to 100g and see how it tastes
  1. Put the raspberries in a sieve over a saucepan, sprinkle with the sugar and leave overnight to macerate
  2. Simmer the juice for a few minutes
  3. Add the berries and simmer for a few more minutes. The gentler the better so the raspberries don't break up
  4. Add the agar agar, stir gently and boil gently for 1 minute
  5. Store in sterilized jars for up to 2 months
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
